snippet.title: King Of Ping Pong MEGAMIX | Steam Next Fest Trailer
snippet.description:
Do you think you have what it takes to become the 🏓 King of Ping Pong?
Play the Demo during Steam Next Fest here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2940100/King_of_Ping_Pong_MEGAMIX/

____

Wishlist the game here:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2940100/King_of_Ping_Pong_MEGAMIX/

Discord: https://discord.gg/UJQsp4AYbJ
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@SuspiciousJam
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SusJamGames

____

King of Ping Pong MEGAMIX is an Indie Boss Rush Arcade game with a fast-paced action-packed journey to become the best in the world. Defeat a series quirky characters utilizing quick wit and precise timing to secure victory in increasingly challenging matches!

In the full version,
- Experience 5 unique bosses, with unique playstyles and abilities!
- Challenge the tournament in Arcade mode, a non stop campaign to become the King of Ping Pong.
- Rematch the champions in singles matches.
- Game not hard enough? Take on Championship mode, an amped up version of Arcade mode where you can face the true might of the champions!
- Gallery with unlockable lore, concept art and more!
